name: Wixel
tag_list: software-development, custom-business-software, custom-web-app, offshore-software-development, software-development-south-africa, application-development, android-development, ios-development, mobile-application-development, -custom-mobile-app
overview:
Wixel was incorporated in 2010 as a privately-owned software development studio.

Wixel not only produces its own products and apps, but helps entrepreneurs and big brands build theirs. The studio has unwittingly developed a reputation for specialising in the near-impossible - building large, quality apps quickly. Finding solutions to the most infuriating challenges is something the Wixel team takes pride in.

Wixel has built software for a diverse range of clients and industries which include early stage startups, broadcasting and media, financial services, gaming companies, e-commerce companies, search engines and big data companies.

Wixel’s own products, which are mostly aimed at creatives, include an e-commerce framework, a digital delivery and e-payments tool and a bug and feature tracking solution.

In 2011 Wixel launched Wixel Ventures which incubates and funds other entrepreneurs.

The company works with a largely geographically distributed team and has a strong culture of play, creativity and innovation. Wixel’s experimental work is released as Open Source software.

Wixel is self funded and profitable.

offices.address2: Cnr of Coen Steytler and Heerengracht Street
